biotools.summary: Graphical, event-driven tool dedicated to the identification of driver fusion rearrangements in human cancer through the analysis of paired-end high-throughput transcriptome sequencing data. Requires short, paired-end sequences.

bioschemas.name: FusionAnalyser
bioschemas.summary: Graphical, event-driven tool dedicated to the identification of driver fusion rearrangements in human cancer through the analysis of paired-end high-throughput transcriptome sequencing data. Requires short, paired-end sequences.
